flawed_nl_solution:
He had 80-20=<<80-20=30>>30 after the donation
He kept 30/2=<<30/2=15.0>>15.0 after giving half to his brother
So he has 15.0*3=<<15.0*3=45.0>>45.0 coins
He then does 1 more donation and has 45.0-10=<<45.0-10=35.0>>35.0 coins left

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 30. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
